thread.title: The new Unreal Tournament is still chugging along
thread.title_full: The new Unreal Tournament is still chugging along

title: The new Unreal Tournament is still chugging along
text:
The new Unreal Tournament is still chugging along January update reveals raft of changes. By Wesley Yin-Poole   
Epic is still beavering away making the new Unreal Tournament, a game first announced in May 2014. 
The developer just put out a new update for the old-school arena shooter, which adds the new Flag Run game mode. There's also a new prototype weapon, the Lightning Rifle. 
Flag Run combines elements of Capture the Flag and Assault. As with the rest of the game, it's a work in progress. There's more in the video below and the blog post on the Unreal Tournament website . 
Epic is building the new Unreal Tournament alongside the series' community. It bills it as a collaboration between gamers, developers and Epic. It looks like there's still a lot of work left to do (the game's still in a pre-alpha state), but it is playable.
